ticket.title: Problem with table names at running tests
ticket.original-body:
I'm trying to run some tests but I got this error:
ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid: Mysql::Error: Table 'shastic_test.privacy' doesn't exist: DELETE FROM `privacy`
The problem is that I don't have any table called privacy on my database test scheme and I don't know where is this table name comming from.
I have compared my testing database scheme against my production database scheme and I have not found any difference.
Have anyone had this kind of problem?

version.body:
I'm trying to run some tests but I got this error:
ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid: Mysql::Error: Table 'shastic_test.privacy' doesn't exist: DELETE FROM `privacy`
The problem is that I have a table called privacies but I don't have any table called privacy on my database test scheme and I don't know where this table name is comming from.
I have compared my testing database scheme against my testing database scheme and I have not found any difference.
Have anyone had this kind of problem before?
version.body-html:
I'm trying to run some tests but I got this error:

ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid: Mysql::Error: Table 'shastic_test.privacy' doesn't exist: DELETE FROM `privacy`

The problem is that I have a table called privacies but I don't have any table called privacy on my database test scheme and I don't know where this table name is comming from.

I have compared my testing database scheme against my testing database scheme and I have not found any difference.

Have anyone had this kind of problem before?
